home.subtitle: Escape-room style activities, MOOCs and certificates to explore the SDGs in a fun, collaborative way.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: An innovative methodology for schools with escape-room style activities, STEAM education and sustainable development goals.
about.intro: Escape4SDG offers an innovative methodology that builds a long-term alliance between schools and the edutainment sector, supporting the integration of new technologies and non-formal education approaches into the classroom.
objectives: Create an innovative hub of collaboration between schools and the edutainment sector
Provide STEAM-oriented edutainment resources for teachers to put the methodology into action
Support the continuous professional development of teachers in digital and STEAM-oriented edutainment practices
results: Games and activities applicable in the classroom
about.moocCardDesc: Online training course for teachers and educators
about.escapeCardDesc: SDG-focused escape room activities for the classroom
about.hubCardDesc: Comprehensive resource centre with courses, certificates and classroom activities

projects.title: Active Projects
projects.subtitle: Innovative projects we run to achieve sustainable development goals.
projects.intro: Escape4SDG builds a long-term alliance between schools and the edutainment sector, offering STEAM-oriented edutainment resources.
objectives: Create an innovative hub of collaboration between schools and the edutainment sector
Provide STEAM-oriented edutainment resources for teachers
Support teachers' professional development in digital and STEAM-oriented edutainment practices

partners.title: Partner Organisations
partners.subtitle: Working together towards the Sustainable Development Goals.
partners.intro: ESC4SDG and our MOOC platform collaborate with institutions and projects in education and sustainable development.
partners.introDetail: Together with our partners from schools, universities, NGOs and the edutainment sector, we deliver STEAM education and SDG-focused projects.
partners.partnerGridDesc: Institutions we collaborate with in education and sustainable development
